---
title: "Cleaning Climate Data Upon Import"
output: html_notebook
---

***

##Import the Dirty Dataset and Clean It

***

####Set the import_file variable;

```{r}
import_file <- "ADRIAN_SD_b2dates.csv"
dirty <- read.csv(import_file, skip = 7, header = TRUE)
clean <- head(dirty, -14)
rm(dirty)
```


***


##Rename to Unique Filename

***

####Set the new filename;

```{r}
ADRIAN_data <- clean
rm(clean)
```
